name: Excessive Revelry
text: You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: Exhaust Hercules Panhellenios → remove Excessive Revelry from the game. Discard 1 card at random from your hand. Discard this obligation. [star] Boost: You are confused.

name: Clash of the Titans
text: Seeking vengeance and glory, Ares brings war against Hercules and all those who stand with him. Have at thee! When Revealed: Give each enemy a facedown boost card. [amplify]

name: Ares
text: Steady. Toughness. Forced Response: After a character attacks Ares, Ares attacks that character. "Men call me Ares... and tremble when they do. I am the God of War!"

name: Attrition
text: When Revealed: Remove 1 counter from each player card with the uses keyword. Deal 1 damage to each friendly character. [star] Boost: Remove 1 counter from a card you control with the uses keyword.

name: Let There Be War
text: When Revealed: Each minion attacks the player it is engaged with. Each player not engaged with a minion searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and puts it into play engaged with them. (Shuffle.) [star] Boost: This attack gains overkill.
